Mike,

> I'm curious about how (why?) "QA" is using JUnit tests.

Having a =
common platform that runs it all is good. Unit tests and
using JUnit overgr=
ew "developer-only" testing long ago. Sooner
(better) or later they become =
functional tests, user acceptance tests
and what not. 

So, to me limiting =
test run by QA is a natural requirements. We use
Ant's <batchtest if=3D"...=
"> to select what test groups should be run in
a particular case.

HTH

Reg=
ards,

Slava Imeshev
